title: IRREVERSIBLE
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a unique psychological horror with shooter elements, unfolding in the expanse of an enthralling open world. A sinister village awaits you, shrouded in mysteries, populated by monsters, and filled with paranormal phenomena. In this grim place, you will meet its inhabitants, delve into their stories, and take part in saving them from the frightening fates that have befallen them.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / or AMD analogue
